description_for_model: Aurora is an interface designed for controlling Philips Hue Lights through conversation. Users can specify actions like turn off light 1 or change brightness of light 3 and 4, and the system will execute the adjustments. The emphasis is on direct commands, intuitive interactions, and personalization.
description_for_human: A conversational bridge to your Philips Hue Lights. Shape your ambiance with a simple chat.
